description.en:
Beacon is a Proof-of-Stake masternode coin created to make a difference in the real world and support an ecosystem of platforms.

Designed as a long-term, low inflation cryptocurrency, Beacon is a multi-faceted coin that aims to bridge the gap between a strong investment and achieving something noteworthy. BECN is a Proof-of-Stake (POS) / Masternode (MN) coin with pre-allocated percentage rewards.
